plants.name: Tomato

diseases.name: Early Blight
diseases.description: Caused by Alternaria solani, leading to dark spots on leaves.

diseases.name: Late Blight
diseases.description: Caused by Phytophthora infestans, causing dark lesions.

plants.description: Tomatoes are a popular fruit used in various cuisines.
plants.how_to_harvest: Pick when the fruit is fully colored and slightly firm.
plants.planting_and_cultivation: Plant seeds indoors 6-8 weeks before the last frost.
plants.irrigation_and_water_management: Water regularly, keeping the soil moist but not soggy.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Tomatoes are widely grown and have a high market demand.

plants.name: Potato

diseases.name: Black Scurf
diseases.description: Caused by Rhizoctonia solani, resulting in black, scaly patches.

diseases.name: Common Scab
diseases.description: Caused by Streptomyces, forming scabby lesions.

plants.description: Potatoes are a starchy tuber and a staple food in many cultures.
plants.how_to_harvest: Harvest when the tops die back.
plants.planting_and_cultivation: Plant seed potatoes in rows, 12 inches apart.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Potatoes have a stable market demand.

plants.name: Wheat

diseases.name: Rust
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing orange-red pustules on leaves.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.description: Characterized by white powdery fungal growth.

plants.description: Wheat is a major cereal grain and a staple food worldwide.
plants.how_to_harvest: Cut the stalks when the grains are hard.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Wheat has a high global market demand.

plants.name: Corn

diseases.name: Corn Smut
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing galls on ears and kernels.

diseases.name: Gray Leaf Spot
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing gray lesions on leaves.

plants.description: Corn is a versatile crop used for food, feed, and fuel.
plants.how_to_harvest: Harvest when the kernels are firm and full.
plants.planting_and_cultivation: Plant seeds in rows after the last frost.
plants.irrigation_and_water_management: Water regularly, especially during dry spells.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Corn has a high market demand.

plants.name: Rice

diseases.name: Rice Blast
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing lesions on leaves and panicles.

diseases.name: Bacterial Blight
diseases.description: Caused by bacteria, leading to water-soaked lesions.

plants.description: Rice is a staple food for more than half of the world's population.
plants.how_to_harvest: Cut the stalks when the grains are mature.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Rice has a stable market demand.

plants.name: Barley

diseases.name: Barley Yellow Dwarf
diseases.description: A viral disease causing yellowing and stunting.

diseases.name: Net Blotch
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing dark lesions on leaves.

plants.description: Barley is a key ingredient in beer and animal feed.
plants.how_to_harvest: Cut the stalks when the grains are ripe.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Barley has a stable market demand.

plants.name: Oats

diseases.name: Crown Rust
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing yellow-orange pustules.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.description: Characterized by white powdery growth on leaves.

plants.description: Oats are a nutritious grain used for food and animal feed.
plants.how_to_harvest: Cut the stalks when the grains are ripe.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Oats have a stable market demand.

plants.name: Soybean

diseases.name: Soybean Rust
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing reddish-brown lesions.

diseases.name: Bacterial Blight
diseases.description: Caused by bacteria, leading to leaf spots.

plants.description: Soybeans are a versatile crop used for food and oil.
plants.how_to_harvest: Cut the stalks when the pods are mature.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Soybeans have a high market demand.

plants.name: Peanut

diseases.name: Leaf Spot
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing dark spots on leaves.

diseases.name: Southern Blight
diseases.description: A soil-borne disease causing wilting and decay.

plants.description: Peanuts are a nutritious legume used for food and oil.
plants.how_to_harvest: Pull the plants when the leaves turn yellow.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Peanuts have a high market demand.

plants.name: Cabbage

diseases.name: Black Rot
diseases.description: A bacterial disease causing yellow V-shaped lesions.

diseases.name: Downy Mildew
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing yellowing and wilting.

plants.description: Cabbage is a leafy green vegetable used in salads and cooking.
plants.how_to_harvest: Cut the heads when they are firm.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Cabbage has a stable market demand.

plants.name: Carrot

diseases.name: Carrot Rust Fly
diseases.description: A pest causing damage to roots.

diseases.name: Cavity Spot
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing cavities in roots.

plants.description: Carrots are a root vegetable rich in vitamins.
plants.how_to_harvest: Pull the roots when they are mature.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Carrots have a stable market demand.

plants.name: Lettuce

diseases.name: Downy Mildew
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing yellowing and wilting.

diseases.name: Lettuce Mosaic
diseases.description: A viral disease causing mottled leaves.

plants.description: Lettuce is a leafy green vegetable used in salads.
plants.how_to_harvest: Cut the leaves when they are young.
plants.irrigation_and_water_management: Water regularly to keep soil moist.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Lettuce has a high market demand.

plants.name: Onion

diseases.name: Downy Mildew
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing yellowing and wilting.

diseases.name: Onion Fly
diseases.description: A pest causing damage to bulbs.

plants.description: Onions are a staple vegetable used in cooking.
plants.how_to_harvest: Pull the bulbs when the tops die back.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Onions have a stable market demand.

plants.name: Pumpkin

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.description: Characterized by white powdery growth on leaves.

diseases.name: Crown Rot
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing decay at the base.

plants.description: Pumpkin is a versatile vegetable used in cooking and baking.
plants.how_to_harvest: Cut the fruit from the vine.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Pumpkins have a high market demand.

plants.name: Bell Pepper

diseases.name: Bacterial Spot
diseases.description: A bacterial disease causing dark spots on leaves.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.description: Characterized by white powdery growth.

plants.description: Bell peppers are a sweet pepper used in various dishes.
plants.how_to_harvest: Pick when the peppers are firm and colorful.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Bell peppers have a high market demand.

plants.name: Eggplant

diseases.name: Fusarium Wilt
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing wilting and yellowing.

diseases.name: Bacterial Wilt
diseases.description: A bacterial disease causing wilting.

plants.description: Eggplant is a versatile vegetable used in various cuisines.
plants.how_to_harvest: Pick when the fruit is glossy and firm.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Eggplants have a high market demand.

plants.name: Zucchini

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.description: Characterized by white powdery growth.

diseases.name: Bacterial Wilt
diseases.description: A bacterial disease causing wilting.

plants.description: Zucchini is a summer squash used in various dishes.
plants.how_to_harvest: Pick when the fruit is young and tender.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Zucchini has a high market demand.

plants.name: Radish

diseases.name: Flea Beetle
diseases.description: A pest causing holes in leaves.

diseases.name: Downy Mildew
diseases.description: A fungal disease causing yellowing.

plants.description: Radishes are a root vegetable known for their peppery flavor.
plants.how_to_harvest: Pull the roots when they are mature.
plants.market_and_economic_information: Radishes have a stable market demand.
